subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Sterling Shepard, a senior wide receiver for the Sooners, scored two touchdowns and finished with 14 catches for 177 yards as No. 12 Oklahoma upset the No. 4 Bears.
snippet: Sterling Shepard, a senior wide receiver for the Sooners, scored two touchdowns and finished with 14 catches for 177 yards as No. 12 Oklahoma upset the No. 4 Bears.
